mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.category_pid, c.category_name FROM category c left join article_category_ref a on a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.article_id = #{id} ORDER BY c.category_pid ASC
mapper.update: update article a set article_comment_count = (a.article_comment_count + 1) where a.id = #{articleId}
update article a set article_view_count = (a.article_view_count + 1) where a.id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.article_user_id, a.article_title, a.article_is_original, a.article_from, a.article_from_url, a.article_from_author, a.article_from_author_url, a.article_summary, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count, a.article_like_count, a.article_is_comment, a.article_status, a.article_order, a.update_time, a.create_time FROM article a left join article_category_ref acr on a.id = acr.article_id WHERE acr.category_id = #{categoryId} AND a.article_status = #{status}
